name: Simple 1500 Jitsuyou Series Vol. 05: Kusuri no Jiten: Pill Book 2001 Nen Ban
overview: Simple 1500 Jitsuyou Series Vol.05 - Kusuri no Jiten - Pill Book 2001 Edition is the fifth game in the practical 1500 series released for the Playstation One console by D3 Publisher. This time the game let the user check in the game complete database the information about more than 10000 medical medicines that are avaliable in 2001 Pill Book catalog. That way the user will know the possible side effect that some medicines or pills have.
